full_summary:
**Tender Announcement - Demolition of Residential Structures at Yoho National Park**
===========================================================

### Announcement Details ###

| **Field** | **Value** | **Unit** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Title (English) | Stage 2 - Demolition of Residential Structures at Field-Yoho National Park |  |
| Title (French) | Phase 2 - Démolition de structures résidentielles à Field—Parc national Yoho |  |
| Solicitation # | 5P468-23-0175/A-001 |  |
| Tender Closing Date | 2023-10-24 |  |
| Expected Contract Start Date | 2023-10-27 |  |
| Expected Contract End Date | 2023-11-30 |  |
| Trade Agreements Involved | Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) |  |

### Description of Work ###

Parks Canada requires demolition services for two residential structures at Field in Yoho National Park. The scope of work includes hazardous materials abatement, demolition of all structural elements and foundations, waste removal and disposal, and site rehabilitation.

### Procurement Process ###

This tender invitation is for Stage 2 of a two-stage solicitation process. The first stage involved evaluating the qualifications of all interested suppliers. The second stage invites qualified suppliers to submit a financial bid for the project based on specifications and drawings.

### Evaluation Criteria ###

The procurement will be awarded based on the lowest price bid received from a qualified supplier.

### Important Contact Information ###

* **Contracting Authority**: Jen Maheu, Contracting and Procurement Specialist
* **Email**: [jennifer.maheu@pc.gc.ca](mailto:jennifer.maheu@pc.gc.ca)
* **Phone**: (587) 432-8458

### Attachment and Additional Information ###

No additional attachment or information is required for this tender. All relevant documents are included in the tender package. 

**Note**: The solicitation process is currently closed, and the tender status is "Expired".
